key.name: server-url
key.description: The URL of your Wallabag server (e.g., https://wallabag.example.com)

key.name: client-id
key.description: The OAuth client ID for API access

key.name: client-secret
key.description: The OAuth client secret for API access

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to refresh the articles list in minutes (0 = disabled)

key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Whether to show notifications when articles are saved

key.name: max-articles
key.description: Number of recent articles to show in the panel menu
